help.short: The name of Network Virtual Appliance.
Expands referenced resources. Default value is None.

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="additionalNics">
<prop type="array" name="bootStrapConfigurationBlobs">
<prop type="array" name="cloudInitConfigurationBlobs">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@SubResource_read>" name="inboundSecurityRules">
<prop type="array" name="internetIngressPublicIps">
<prop type="array" name="networkInterfaceConfigurations">
<prop type="array" name="ipConfigurations">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@SubResource_read>" name="virtualApplianceConnections">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="virtualApplianceNics">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@SubResource_read>" name="virtualApplianceSites">

command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

help.short: The name of Network Virtual Appliance.

command.name: create

help.short: The name of Network Virtual Appliance.

argGroup.name: Parameters

help.short: Resource ID.

The list of user identities associated with resource. The user identity dictionary key references will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}'.

argGroup.arg: <help short="Location. Values from: `az account list-locations`. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=`."/>

help.short: Space-separated tags: key[=value] [key[=value] ...]. Use "" to clear existing tags.

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.additionalNics" options="additional-nics" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.bootStrapConfigurationBlobs" options="boot-strap-config-blobs boot-blobs" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.cloudInitConfigurationBlobs" options="cloud-init-config-blobs cloud-blobs" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.internetIngressPublicIps" options="internet-ingress-public-ips" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.networkProfile.networkInterfaceConfigurations" options="network-interface-configurations">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.networkProfile.networkInterfaceConfigurations[].properties.ipConfigurations" options="ip-configurations" group="Properties">

help.short: Virtual Appliance Scale Unit.
Virtual Appliance Version.
Virtual Appliance Vendor.
Name or ID of the virtual hub to which the Security Partner Provider belongs.

json.schema:
<userAssigned action="create" type="array" name="userAssigned" arg="$parameters.identity.userAssigned">
<prop type="array" name="additionalNics" arg="$parameters.properties.additionalNics">
<prop type="array" name="bootStrapConfigurationBlobs" arg="$parameters.properties.bootStrapConfigurationBlobs">
<prop type="array" name="cloudInitConfigurationBlobs" arg="$parameters.properties.cloudInitConfigurationBlobs">
<prop type="array" name="internetIngressPublicIps" arg="$parameters.properties.internetIngressPublicIps">
<prop type="array" name="networkInterfaceConfigurations" arg="$parameters.properties.networkProfile.networkInterfaceConfigurations">
<prop type="array" name="ipConfigurations" arg="$parameters.properties.networkProfile.networkInterfaceConfigurations[].properties.ipConfigurations">

<prop type="array" name="additionalNics">
<prop type="array" name="bootStrapConfigurationBlobs">
<prop type="array" name="cloudInitConfigurationBlobs">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@SubResource_read>" name="inboundSecurityRules">
<prop type="array" name="internetIngressPublicIps">
<prop type="array" name="networkInterfaceConfigurations">
<prop type="array" name="ipConfigurations">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@SubResource_read>" name="virtualApplianceConnections">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="virtualApplianceNics">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@SubResource_read>" name="virtualApplianceSites">

command.name: update

help.short: The name of Network Virtual Appliance.

argGroup.name: Parameters

help.short: Resource ID.
The service principal that has read access to cloud-init and config blob.

The type of identity used for the resource. The type 'SystemAssigned, UserAssigned' includes both an implicitly created identity and a set of user assigned identities. The type 'None' will remove any identities from the virtual machine.

The list of user identities associated with resource. The user identity dictionary key references will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}'.

argGroup.arg: <help short="Location. Values from: `az account list-locations`. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=`."/>

help.short: Space-separated tags: key[=value] [key[=value] ...]. Use "" to clear existing tags.

command.argGroup:
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.properties.additionalNics" options="additional-nics" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.properties.bootStrapConfigurationBlobs" options="boot-strap-config-blobs boot-blobs" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.properties.cloudInitConfigurationBlobs" options="cloud-init-config-blobs cloud-blobs" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.properties.internetIngressPublicIps" options="internet-ingress-public-ips" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.properties.networkProfile.networkInterfaceConfigurations" options="network-interface-configurations">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.properties.networkProfile.networkInterfaceConfigurations[].properties.ipConfigurations" options="ip-configurations" group="Properties">

help.short: Virtual Appliance Scale Unit.
Virtual Appliance Version.
Virtual Appliance Vendor.
Name or ID of the virtual hub to which the Security Partner Provider belongs.
